description: Verify the payment-fix skill correctly parses scoring output, prioritizes, fixes, and re-scores.

tests.name: Accept Scoring Input
tests.prompt: Run payment-fix with the scorecard as input
tests.setup: Provide a payment-scoring scorecard with 8 issues across Checkout, Webhooks, Security, Subscriptions.
expectations: Run payment-fix with the scorecard as input
Verify skill parses all 8 issues with correct severity and category
Verify skill identifies the weighted score and grade
tests.pass_criteria: All issues extracted. No issue lost or duplicated.

tests.name: Fix in Severity Order
tests.prompt: Run payment-fix and observe fix application order
tests.setup: Scorecard contains CRITICAL (missing webhook signature verification), HIGH (no error handling on checkout), MEDIUM (no customer portal config).
tests.pass_criteria: Webhook signature verification fixed first (CRITICAL), then checkout error handling (HIGH, Checkout 15% weight), then portal config (MEDIUM). No MEDIUM fix applied before all HIGH items resolved.

tests.name: Fix References Correct Pattern
tests.prompt: Run payment-fix and check which reference file the skill loads
expectations: Check which reference file the skill loads
tests.pass_criteria: Skill loads `references/fix-patterns/webhook-integration.md` and applies the "Webhook Signature Verification" pattern. Fix adds `stripe.webhooks.constructEvent()` call with raw body parsing.

tests.name: Verification Step Confirms Fix
tests.prompt: Run payment-fix to apply the Checkout Session Creation fix and verify results
tests.setup: Apply the "Checkout Session Creation" fix from `checkout-billing.md`.
expectations: Run payment-fix to apply the fix
Check that skill verifies: TypeScript compiles, webhook test passes, checkout flow works
tests.pass_criteria: Skill confirms checkout session created with success_url, cancel_url, metadata, and line_items. Reports verification result before moving to next fix.

tests.name: Re-Score Shows Improvement
tests.prompt: Run payment-fix through full cycle and compare before/after scores
tests.setup: Initial score 58/100 (grade F). Apply fixes for 2 CRITICAL + 4 HIGH issues.
tests.pass_criteria: Re-score produces a higher weighted score. Each fixed category shows improvement. Final grade is at least B. Report uses `assets/templates/fix-report.md.template` format.
